/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. Buildings rise in the background, their architecture hinting at the city's rich history and culture. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
